content.description: This is the large jumble of boulders found on Westridge Road between the Centennial Trail trailhead parking lot and the "The Preserve" sign bolted to a nearby rock face. There are about 45 or so face and crack routes here on good ol' In-Town granite. Problems tend to be highball. It has a south side facing Westridge Rd., an east end facing the trailhead and RV storage lot, and a north side that faces some private homes. (This area was formally known as the Westridge Boulders. I figured that if someone is going to go through the trouble of bolting a name to them, we might as well use that name!)
